nodes.text: Gilas was a male Trandoshan who kidnapped Jedi Padawans and dumped them on Wasskah, the moon of Trandosha, where they would be hunted for sport. After capturing Ahsoka Tano on Felucia and releasing her and other recent prisoners on the moon, the Trandoshans quickly opened fire on them. Soon after, they proceeded to hunted down any of the surviving prisoners. Unbeknownst to the hunters, Tano, one of the few survivors, found and united with Jinx, O-Mer, and Kalifa, three other abducted Padawans who had been transported to the moon at an earlier date; the four began to plan and soon executed a counterattack. The Trandoshans were able to kill Kalifa. After attacking the Trandoshan dropship, the Jedi joined with a Wookiee by the name of Chewbacca.

Gilas was stationed at a floating fortress on the moon when three Padawans – Tano, O-Mer, and Jinx – and Chewbacca infiltrated their base. Trandoshans overwhelmed the prisoners, but Gilas was attacked by General Tarfful when he arrived with Wookiee reinforcements; Gilas engaged the Wookiee in hand to hand combat, but was overpowered and thrown to the ground. As he tried to get up, Tarfful stomped on the Trandoshan's face, crushing his face and killing him.
